remarks: Any infinite set has an ultrafilter on it whose elements are of the same cardinality as the set.  Any such ultrafilter is necessarily free. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 7-Dec-2009.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Aug-2015.)
statement:
ufilen $p |- ( _om ~<_ X -> E. f e. ( UFil ` X ) A. x e. f x ~~ X ) $.
$d X f x $.
$d f x $.
